data.description:
STARWAVE launches you into a cosmic voyage of high-energy music and exhilarating freeform movement. Feel the rhythm of the universe as you soar through distant galaxies bringing color and light to the night sky. Ride an uplifting wave of energy for a daily rush of interstellar euphoria â€“ no subscriptions required.

"Pure joy... One of my most anticipated Quest titles in 2024." -UploadVR
